price: 21.keenih teceen yaras (mahri kinnuk) keenik eile Beytaanam mannaay? Nummah gennaaqol mariiy maral fidoh siinik xayyoowehik, Yalli gibdi ateeban (xagana kinnuk) siinik bee keenih Amqee kee hinnay maquk ken cabe takkeenimil.
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ تَأۡخُذُونَهُۥ وَقَدۡ أَفۡضَىٰ بَعۡضُكُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ وَأَخَذۡنَ مِنكُم مِّيثَٰقًا غَلِيظٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wakayfa takhudhūnahu waqad afḍā baʿḍukum ilā baʿḍin wa-akhadhna minkum mīthāqan ghalīẓan
